Uses of Interface
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.IAeEndpointReference

Packages that use IAeEndpointReference
org.activebpel.rt.bpel This package contains classes for creating a BPEL model and for implements a standalone BPEL engine for testing designs. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl This package contains the base classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.addressing   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.endpoints Endpoint reference factory, serializer, and deserializer.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.queue Contains classes that model inbound and outbound messages from the engine as well as alarms.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.visitors Classes that visit a tree of BPEL implementation objects and save or restore their state.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server Root package for the Active Endpoints BPEL Engine.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.addressing Handles partner addressing (finding the correct endpoint reference for a given business partner).  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.addressing.pdef Handles partner definitions and addressing across all BPEL processes.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy Process deployment.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.pdd This package contains objects that are created during processing of the process deployment descriptor.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.validate Root package for the Active Endpoints BPEL Deployment Validation code.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.invoke   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.receive
